channel.title: Client Run Error
channel.description: Can someone help me i have uploaded my client and people download it but when they run it it wont work Please help... its a 317 client if it helps they can't change the java to theirs because this is the code: @echo off Title Client START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit It works for me but not them Help :confused:

item.title: Client Run Error
item.dc:creator: @iiLovePVP iiLovePVP
item.description:
@iiLovePVP wrote:

Can someone help me i have uploaded my client and people download it but when they run it it wont work
Please help…
its a 317 client if it helps
they can’t change the java to theirs because this is the code:
@echo off
Title Client
START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
It works for me but not them Help

Read full topic
